scenes.background: Monica rubs her temples in frustration while Bob stares at the screen intensely.
scenes.description: 'We need a bit more clarity. Can you walk us through just one more example?'

options.text: Alright, I'll walk you through one more example, but let's make it quick.
options.analysis: You demonstrated strong empathy and perception by agreeing to help, though your self-regulation and motivation to maintain your leave were slightly lower.

options.text: I think you can handle this yourselves if you review the previous guidelines carefully.
options.analysis: You encouraged self-reliance and showed good self-regulation, but your empathy and motivation to help were lower.

options.text: I'll give you a quick example, but I must get back to my leave soon.
options.analysis: You balanced your willingness to help with your need for time off, showing good perception and empathy, though your self-regulation was slightly lower.
